tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE celebrity_inventory ( 
    item_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, 
    item_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, 
    item_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
    item_quantity INT NOT NULL, 
    item_price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL 
);

CREATE TABLE clothing_inventory (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    item_name TEXT,
    category TEXT,
    size TEXT,
    quantity INT
);
CREATE TABLE accessory_inventory (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    item_name TEXT,
    category TEXT,
    material TEXT,
    quantity INT
);

CREATE TABLE clothing_inventory (
    item_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    item_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    item_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    item_color VARCHAR(20),
    item_size VARCHAR(10),
    item_price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE accessory_inventory (
    accessory_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    accessory_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    accessory_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    accessory_color VARCHAR(20),
    accessory_material VARCHAR(50),
    accessory_price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE stylist_inventory (
    stylist_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    stylist_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    stylist_specialty VARCHAR(50),
    stylist_location VARCHAR(50),
    stylist_contact VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE clothing (
    item_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    item_name VARCHAR(255),
    brand VARCHAR(255),
    quantity INT,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE accessories (
    accessory_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    accessory_name VARCHAR(255),
    brand VARCHAR(255),
    quantity INT,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE stylist_inventory (
    item_id UUID,
    stylist_id UUID,
    quantity INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (item_id, stylist_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (item_id) REFERENCES clothing(item_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (stylist_id) REFERENCES stylist(stylist_id)
);

CREATE TABLE stylist_clothing_connections (
    connection_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    stylist_id INT NOT NULL,
    item_id INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (stylist_id) REFERENCES stylist(stylist_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (item_id) REFERENCES clothing_inventory(item_id)
);

CREATE TABLE stylist_accessory_connections (
    connection_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    stylist_id INT NOT NULL,
    accessory_id INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (stylist_id) REFERENCES stylist(stylist_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (accessory_id) REFERENCES accessory_inventory(accessory_id)
);
